title: Global Net Lease: Understanding The AFFO Metric On This 10% Yielder (NYSE:GNL)
description: Global Net Lease's financials are challenging to interpret due to frequent adjustments. We give our version of AFFO that shows the dividend is poorly covered. Read the REIT analysis here.
content:
Conservative Income Portfolio targets the best value stocks with the highest margins of safety. The volatility of these investments is further lowered using the best priced options. Our Enhanced Equity Income Solutions Portfolio is designed to reduce volatility while generating 7-9% yields.

Global Net Lease, Inc. (NYSE: GNL ) is trying to reinvent itself. The REIT which bought properties (and also another REIT) left, right and center, has been on a disposition binge of sorts. Let's face it. Some REITs present non-GAAP metrics that are pretty difficult to parse through. This

Trapping Value provides Covered Calls, and Preferred Stock Trader covers Fixed Income. The Covered Calls Portfolio is designed to provide lower volatility income investing with a focus on capital preservation. The fixed income portfolio focuses on buying securities with high income potential and heavy undervaluation relative to comparatives. Learn more .

Trapping Value is a team of analysts with over 40 years of combined experience generating options income while also focusing on capital preservation. They run the investing group Conservative Income Portfolio in partnership with Preferred Stock Trader. The investing group features two income-generating portfolios and a bond ladder.

shortSummary: Global Net Lease's AFFO is a complex, volatile investment, with potential for significant losses and losses, thanks to Trapping Value's portfolio.
argos_summary: The Conservative Income Portfolio focuses on value stocks with high margins of safety and aims to reduce volatility through well-priced options, targeting yields of 7-9%. Global Net Lease, Inc. is undergoing a transformation by selling off properties, while Trapping Value offers investment strategies like Covered Calls and a Fixed Income Portfolio to enhance income and capital preservation.
